mapper.select: SELECT bno,title,content,board_date,(select spot from member,board where board.mid = member.mid) spot from board order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno,title,content,board_date,mid) values(select NVL(MAX(bno)+1,1)from board), #{title},#{content},sysdate,#{spot} )
mapper.select: select bno,title,content,board_date,(select spot from member,board where board.mid = member.mid) from board where bno = #{bno}
